name: parafia-cms-backend
description: CMS Backend for Parafia Trojcy Przenajswietszej

scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postbuild:admin: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const src='admin/dist';const dest='admin-dist';if(fs.existsSync(dest))fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('Admin built to admin-dist/')"
